animeTitle: Circuit Angel: Ketsui no Starting Grid
animeDescription: Mariko is tough yet kind girl who is really into motorcycles. She ends up in a race to settle things between the rich son of bike maker and herself.  (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Nanba, Keiichi', 'Horiuchi, Kenyuu', 'Okamoto, Maya', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Futamata, Issei', 'Miyauchi, Kouhei', 'Moriguchi, Hiroko', 'Genda, Tesshou']
